title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument: Traveling Trunks
body: Traveling Trunks          Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument Hagerman's Fun Fossil Traveling Trunks    The Traveling Trunk is available for grade levels 4-6 or 7-12.  It includes casts of horse skulls representing a portion of the evolution of horses, geologic samples from the Monument, books, DVDs, and a curriculum guide. The trunk provides a variety of information about Idaho, the Oregon Trail, as well as paleontology and geology.      Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Fourth Grade-Twelfth Grade Subjects:Earth Science, Education, Paleontology Keywords:fossils, geology, Evolution, horses, Pliocene Epoch
